extracted_playbook.title: Update to Version 1.0.13 or Later
extracted_playbook.description: Update the system to version 1.0.13 or later to fix the vulnerability as stated by Delta Electronics.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet to minimize network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls for Network Isolation
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA's resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult CISA's ICS Security Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Consult CISA's ICS webpage for additional mitigation guidance and recommended practices, including the technical information paper ICS-TIP-12-146-01B.
